name: Spawn of Alquam
description: The Spawn of Alquam is a large fiend known for its chaotic evil nature, blending agility and cleverness in combat. It possesses talons and a vicious bite, and it can lurk in dim light or shadows for stealth.
memorable: Utilizes ambush tactics, keen senses, and can communicate with birds.
goals: Surprise and overwhelm enemies, dominate in battle.
relations: Often associated with other chaotic fiends or dark entities.
environment: Typically found in dark, shadowy areas or locations conducive to stealth.
strengths: High Dexterity and various combat abilities enhance its ambush tactics.
weaknesses: Relatively low Strength compared to its other attributes.
attacks: Makes multiattacks with sharp talons and a biting attack, can also unleash a necrotic ranged attack.
most_powerful_ability: Gloomspittle, which can blind targets and deal necrotic damage.
senses: Possesses advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks relying on sight, with passive Perception of 16.
skills: Proficient in stealth and deception, excels in ambush situations.
additional_information: Immune to poison and charmed or frightened conditions.
Resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage.
Can hide as a bonus action in dim light or darkness.
Has advantage on attack rolls against surprised creatures.
Can deal extra damage with its Sneak Attack ability.
test_queries: large chaotic evil fiend with stealth attacks
sneaky fiend that communicates with birds
fiend that can blind targets with a ranged attack
fiend with ambush tactics and keen senses
dangerous fiend utilizing stealth and ambush
